fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose to go on Hellert tonight. You will gain basic defense, and anyone who visits you tonight will have Hell inflicted upon them. (2 uses)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - If you are hanged, all players who voted for you will have Hell inflicted upon them.

fields.name: Effects Of Hell, In Order:
fields.value:
- You learn the target's role.
- Roleblocked
- Basic Attacked
- Disguised as a completely random role.
- Basic Attacked
- Granted Powerful Defense for this night.
- Lose all immunities
- Become lynchproof for tomorrow
- Powerfully Poisoned
- One ability is randomly forced to become 1 use.
- Unstoppably Rampaged
- Granted an Overprotective Autovest
- Converted into a Survivor (96)
- Cause(s) of their death disguised as God (12)
- Abilities redirected towards theirself (if immune to the RB)
- Removed from the game.
- Banned from the game.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Inflict Hell upon at least 5 players.
